parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From diaballo; a traducer; specially, Satan.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
(a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.
Desire, eagerness for, inordinate desire, lust. From epithumeo; a longing.
That, that one there, yonder. From ekei; that one (neuter) thing); often intensified by the article prefixed.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A murderer, man-slayer. From anthropos and kteino; a manslayer.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
From archomai; a commencement, or chief.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To stand fast, stand firm, persevere. From the perfect tense of histemi; to be stationary, i.e. to persevere.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From alethes; truth.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
From alethes; truth.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
When, whenever. From hote and an; whenever; also causatively inasmuch as.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Pertaining to self, i.e. One's own; by implication, private or separate.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A liar, deceiver. From pseudomai; a falsifier.
And, even, also, namely.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Neuter 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
